mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_priority as noticePriority, reg_date as regDate, notice_readcount as noticeReadcount from notice order by noticePriority desc, notice_no desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_Writer as noticeWriter, notice_Content as noticeContent, reg_date as regDate, notice_readcount as noticeReadcount, filename as filename, filepath as filepath from notice where notice_no=#{noticeNo}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_readcount = notice_readcount + 1 where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: select N.PREVNO from (select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_priority as noticePriority, reg_date as regDate, notice_readcount as noticeReadcount, LAG(NOTICE_NO, 1, -1) OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_PRIORITY DESC, NOTICE_NO DESC) AS PREVNO, LEAD(NOTICE_NO, 1, -1) OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_PRIORITY DESC, NOTICE_NO DESC) AS NEXTNO from NOTICE)N WHERE N.NOTICENO= #{noticeNo}

select N.NEXTNO from (select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_priority as noticePriority, reg_date as regDate, notice_readcount as noticeReadcount, LAG(NOTICE_NO, 1, -1) OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_PRIORITY DESC, NOTICE_NO DESC) AS PREVNO, LEAD(NOTICE_NO, 1, -1) OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_PRIORITY DESC, NOTICE_NO DESC) AS NEXTNO from NOTICE)N WHERE N.NOTICENO= #{noticeNo}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_priority as noticePriority, notice_content as noticeContent, reg_date as regDate, notice_readcount as noticeReadcount, (select member_nickname from member where member_id=notice_writer) as memberNickname from notice order by noticePriority desc, notice_no desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
and memberNickname like '%' || #{searchword} || '%'
and noticeWriter like '%' || #{searchword} || '%'
and noticeTitle like '%' || #{searchword} || '%'
and noticeContent like '%' || #{searchword} || '%'

select count(*) from (select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_priority as noticePriority, reg_date as regDate, notice_readcount as noticeReadcount, (select member_nickname from member where member_id=notice_writer) as memberNickname from notice
)n where memberNickname like '%' || #{searchword} || '%'
where notice_writer like '%' || #{searchword} || '%')n
where notice_title like '%' || #{searchword} || '%')n
where notice_content like '%' || #{searchword} || '%')n
